title: Bug 115960: Datetime values retrieved from table show different format in dynamic text item and data/text item
OB: When retrieving datetime values from a table, the dynamic text item and the data/text item display them in different formats.
EB: The dynamic text item and the data/text item should display the datetime values in the same format.
SR: To reproduce: 1. Create three items. 2. Set the content of all three items as 'new Date()'. 3. Save and preview the items. Expected result: The dynamic text item and the data/text item should display the datetime values in the same format. Actual result: The data and text item display the datetime values in the same format, but the dynamic text item displays them in a different format.
